pipelineid.description: PipelineID allows to identify a full pipeline run, this value is propagated into each target if not defined at that level

title.description: Title is used for the full pipeline

spec.description: PullRequestSpec is a specific struct containing pullrequest settings provided by an updatecli configuration

pullrequests.description: PullRequests defines the list of Pull Request configuration which need to be managed

branch.description: Branch specifies which github branch to work on

directory.description: Directory specifies where the github repository is cloned on the local disk

email.description: Email specifies which emails to use when creating commits

repository.description: Repository specifies the name of a repository for a specific owner

token.description: Token specifies the credential used to authenticate with

url.description: URL specifies the default github url in case of GitHub enterprise

username.description: Username specifies the username used to authenticate with Github API

user.description: User specifies the user of the git commit messages

pullrequest.description: Deprecated since https://github.com/updatecli/updatecli/issues/260, must be clean up

gpg.description: GPG key and passphrased used for commit signing

spec.description: Spec represents the configuration input

scms.description: SCMs defines the list of repository configuration used to fetch content from.

depends_on.description: depends_on specifies which resources must be executed before the current one

addprefix.description: AddPrefix adds a prefix to the transformer input value

addsuffix.description: AddSuffix adds a suffix to the transformer input value

trimprefix.description: TrimPrefix removes a prefix to the transformer input value

trimsuffix.description: TrimSuffix removes the suffix from the transformer input value

from.description: From defines the source value which need to be replaced

to.description: To defines the "to what" a "from" value needs to be replaced

items.description: Replacer is struct used to feed strings.Replacer

replacers.description: Replacers specifies a list of replacer instruction

from.description: From defines the source value which need to be replaced

to.description: To defines the "to what" a "from" value needs to be replaced

replacer.description: Replacer specifies what value needs to be changed and how

find.description: Find searches for a specific value if it exists and return false if it doesn't

pattern.description: Pattern defines regular expression to use for retrieving a submatch

captureindex.description: CaptureIndex defines which substring occurrence to retrieve. Note also that a value of `0` for `captureIndex` returns all submatches, and individual submatch indexes start at `1`.

findsubmatch.description: Find searches for a specific value if it exists then return the value using regular expression

semverinc.description: SemvVerInc specifies a  comma separated list semantic versioning component that needs to be upgraded.

items.description: Transformer holds a tranformer rule

transformers.description: transformers defines how the default input value need to be transformed

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for a "file" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file

accesskey.description: accesskey specifies the aws access key which combined with `secretkey`, is one of the way to authenticate

secretkey.description: secretkey specifies the aws secret key which combined with `accesskey`, is one of the way to authenticate

values.description: Values specifies a filter value for a specific filter name.

items.description: Filter represents the updatecli configuration describing AMI filters.

filters.description: Filters specifies a list of AMI filters

region.description: Region specifies the AWS region to use when looking for AMI

endpoint.description: Endpoint specifies the AWS endpoin to use when looking for AMI

dryrun.description: Dryrun allows to Check whether you have the required permissions for the action.

sortby.description: Sortby specifies the order of AMI-ID that will be used to retrieve the last element such as `creationdateasc`

spec.description: Spec contains the updatecli configuration provided by users.

file.description: [target] Defines the Helm Chart file to update.

key.description: [target] Defines the key within the file that need to be updated.

name.description: [target] Defines the Chart name path like "stable/chart".

value.description: [target] Defines the value to set for a key

version.description: [source,condition] Defines the Chart version, default value set based on sourceinput value

versionincrement.description: [target] Defines if a Chart changes, triggers (or not) a Chart version update, accepted values is a comma separated list of "none,major,minor,patch"

appversion.description: [target] Defines if AppVersion must be updated as well

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for an "helmchart" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file

file.description: [target] Defines the Helm Chart file to update.

key.description: [target] Defines the key within the file that need to be updated.

name.description: [target] Defines the Chart name path like "stable/chart".

value.description: [target] Defines the value to set for a key

version.description: [source,condition] Defines the Chart version, default value set based on sourceinput value

versionincrement.description: [target] Defines if a Chart changes, triggers (or not) a Chart version update, accepted values is a comma separated list of "none,major,minor,patch"

appversion.description: [target] Defines if AppVersion must be updated as well

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for an "helmchart" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file

pattern.description: Pattern defines regular expression to use for retrieving a submatch

captureindex.description: CaptureIndex defines which substring occurrence to retrieve. Note also that a value of `0` for `captureIndex` returns all submatches, and individual submatch indexes start at `1`.

findsubmatch.description: Find searches for a specific value if it exists then return the value using regular expression

semverinc.description: SemvVerInc specifies a  comma separated list semantic versioning component that needs to be upgraded.

items.description: Transformer holds a tranformer rule

transformers.description: transformers defines how the default input value need to be transformed

branch.description: Branch specifies which github branch to work on

directory.description: Directory specifies where the github repository is cloned on the local disk

email.description: Email specifies which emails to use when creating commits

repository.description: Repository specifies the name of a repository for a specific owner

token.description: Token specifies the credential used to authenticate with

url.description: URL specifies the default github url in case of GitHub enterprise

username.description: Username specifies the username used to authenticate with Github API

user.description: User specifies the user of the git commit messages

pullrequest.description: Deprecated since https://github.com/updatecli/updatecli/issues/260, must be clean up

gpg.description: GPG key and passphrased used for commit signing

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for a "jenkins" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file

scmid.description:
!deprecated, please use scmid
scmid specifies the scm configuration key associated to the current resource

depends_on.description: depends_on specifies which resources must be executed before the current one

addprefix.description: AddPrefix adds a prefix to the transformer input value

addsuffix.description: AddSuffix adds a suffix to the transformer input value

trimprefix.description: TrimPrefix removes a prefix to the transformer input value

trimsuffix.description: TrimSuffix removes the suffix from the transformer input value

from.description: From defines the source value which need to be replaced

to.description: To defines the "to what" a "from" value needs to be replaced

items.description: Replacer is struct used to feed strings.Replacer

replacers.description: Replacers specifies a list of replacer instruction

from.description: From defines the source value which need to be replaced

to.description: To defines the "to what" a "from" value needs to be replaced

captureindex.description: CaptureIndex defines which substring occurrence to retrieve. Note also that a value of `0` for `captureIndex` returns all submatches, and individual submatch indexes start at `1`.

architecture.description: Architecture specifies the container image architecture such as `amd64`

image.description: Image specifies the container image such as `updatecli/updatecli`

tag.description: Tag specifies the container image tag such as `latest`

username.description: Username specifies the container registry username to use for authentication. Not compatible with token

password.description: Password specifies the container registry password to use for authentication. Not compatible with token

token.description: Token specifies the container registry token to use for authentication. Not compatible with username/password

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for a "dockerdigest" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file

items.description: Transformer holds a tranformer rule

transformers.description: transformers defines how the default input value need to be transformed

file.description: [target] Defines the Helm Chart file to update.

key.description: [target] Defines the key within the file that need to be updated.

name.description: [target] Defines the Chart name path like "stable/chart".

value.description: [target] Defines the value to set for a key

version.description: [source,condition] Defines the Chart version, default value set based on sourceinput value

versionincrement.description: [target] Defines if a Chart changes, triggers (or not) a Chart version update, accepted values is a comma separated list of "none,major,minor,patch"

appversion.description: [target] Defines if AppVersion must be updated as well

spec.description: Spec defines a specification for an "helmchart" resource parsed from an updatecli manifest file
